column5: Guests love the colorful art and natural beauty that make this clean, comfortable home special. New appliances and fixtures, wood or tile floors, and a fresh-bright feel make it cheery and relaxing. Full kitchen, sunny patio, enclosed backyard with trees, covered parking, shared laundry room (with separate apt. listing). Pack-and-play crib for small guests. Central to city and major roads yet a short walk to 1,000-acre McAllister Park. Airport 10 min., Downtown 20 min. Kids and Pets Welcome!
column8: Bright Artist Home Central to Park, Airport, Life!
